name: FFXIV Battle
description:
CONTROLS:
Move: WASD
Attack: H

My first completed game jam, hopefully the beginning of a long journey. It's a brawler based on Final Fantasy 14 that was actually inspired by Ragnarok Battle Offline. The cliche I went with was "Holy Trinity" and the goal was to move towards a game where players control a Tank, a Healer, and a DPS, but I was only able to get some of the healer done for this jam.

Though I wasn't able to get a ton of the movements I wanted because the art would've taken to long, in 10 days I was able to create something that I found I could easily add moves, combos, and animations to, so long as I have the art.
